apiḷahati，apiḷandhati  [Sk. apinayhati] 結ぶ，飾る. pp. apiḷaddha. cf. apiḷandhana

Apiḷahati，& Apiḷandhati [Sk. apinahyati，on n：ḷ see note on gala，& cp. guṇa：guḷa，veṇu：veḷu etc. On ndh for yh see avanandhati] to tie on，fasten，bind together； to adorn oneself with （Acc.） J.V，400 （ger. apiḷayha = piḷandhitvā C.） -- Cp. apiḷandhana & pp apiladdha. （Page 55）
apiḷahati：အပိ-ဠဟတိ အပိ-ဠန္ဓတိ
